author: Pamz18

review: It's the. Best I  ever had thanks Ray
author: Ray

review: works great but is only as good as your network providers true delivered speed
author: pepperpat

review: I was extremely disappointed with the Fire TV Stick and returned it.  First off it took over 10 trys to even connected with my wireless network.  Then once it was connected it kept losing it even when the signal strength said "Very Good".  I live in a 900 square ft house.  Every other wireless device I own has no issues staying connected even when I'm out working in the yard.  I was so excited to get this and it turned out to be a gigantic waste of my time.
author: Kristine Arvizu

review: Not a bad device for the money although it does lag a bit at times for those looking for a Chromecast replacement I would recommend this
author: chase arthur

review: The Amazon fire stick is very simple to plug in and easy to operate!  We really like it.
author: Kathy Bigler

review: Very easy to install and works very well. Love being freed from having to use a player of some kind.
